name: On top of the mountain and into the deep- To the heart and beyond of Swabia
description: First of all, don't think that the name is just a rhyming phrase, it is quite literal. From the touching the peaks that decorate the horizon in Stuttgart to feeling the serenity of lake Constance, from the wilderness of the Swabian Alb to  Sophistication of the city, the trip will have it all. The day may be quiet and peaceful but the night would be shiny and loud because i make sure, we cover it all.
